pageContext.claim: “We just had approved recently -- we just had approved -- we're fixing up all of our airports. Billions of dollars just got approved, and I'm signing it shortly.”
pageContext.analysis: It's not clear which airports Trump is referring to or what he means by "approved." The House has passed the FAA Reauthorization Act of 2018, which includes funding for airports. Trump can't sign this bill until it passes the Senate, where it is pending.
